title: Rell
description: Born into race of perpetual refugees living at the edge of the desert, Rell is surprised when a holy woman invites her to become part of a group of women trained to protect, and destined to marry, the kingdom’s noblemen. Just as she is set to earn her place, prejudices in the king’s court and Rell’s friendship with a scholarly prince threaten to destroy her already unstable place amongst the fair-skinned city dwellers. As the prince’s wedding to Rell’s best friend approaches, and a set of gruesome attacks leads Rell and the prince into the darkest part of the kingdom’s history, Rell must decide if her father’s dream of a better life and the holy woman’s foresight are enough to keep her bound to her duty as a member of the elite group.
author: Jenel Alan
